basics.name: Teguh Prabowo Wijangkoro
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: Experienced Back End Developer with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry. Skilled in SQL, PHP, C++, Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), and English. Strong engineering professional with a Bachelor's degree focused in Information System from Universitas Dian Nuswantoro.

work.name: PT Talenta Informasi Teknologi

highlights: Involve in database structure decision making
Integrate third party service like Firebase, Midtrans

work.summary: Assisting lecturer in Programming and Algorithm course

projects.name: Golek Truk
projects.description: Build backend service. An advertisement service for Shippers and Truckers related without in-application transaction between seller and buyer.
highlights: Collaborate with 1 other Backend Developer, 2 Frontend Developers, 2 Business Analysts
Design and build REST API using FastAPI framework
Research and integrate Firebase Authentication for authentication service
Research and integrate Midtrans for payment gateway
AWS S3 for uploaded file storage service

projects.name: Siba Promoter
projects.description: Built two backend services; (1)Interactive Web Trucker, an application for promoting Siba's orders to the partners via Web Application or Telegram Chat Application. (2)Backoffice, a financial application that records the transaction Interactive Web Trucker invoices and bills and generate journals and reports
highlights: Collaborate with 1 other Backend Developer, 1 Frontend Developer, 2 Business Analysts
Design and build REST API using FastAPI framework
AWS S3 for uploaded file storage
Research and integrate with Telegram Bot API using python
